originalText.text: Dr. Isabel Del Carpio is AMAZING! She has been my dentist for a few years now, and she is incredibly patient and understanding. I used to have a ton of anxiety when it came to dental work. She has worked with me and met me where I'm at, taking breaks when I was overwhelmed, and calmly explaining everything that was going on. She is also incredibly efficient and quick! I've sent many friends to her and will continue to sing her praise to anyone in need of a new dentist! Also, the her team is incredible!! Rose and Emilio take care of me, every time!

text.text: Dr. Isabel Del Carpio is AMAZING! She has been my dentist for a few years now, and she is incredibly patient and understanding. I used to have a ton of anxiety when it came to dental work. She has worked with me and met me where I'm at, taking breaks when I was overwhelmed, and calmly explaining everything that was going on. She is also incredibly efficient and quick! I've sent many friends to her and will continue to sing her praise to anyone in need of a new dentist! Also, the her team is incredible!! Rose and Emilio take care of me, every time!

originalText.text:
I love Mint + Bella. The staff are friendly, resourceful, and so knowledgeable. The whole office is comfortable and clean and I actually look forward to going there every time.

Dr. Isabel always answers my questions and has given me a seamless dental experience along with her assistant Emilio, who is so nice! Not only that, Rose at the front desk is so approachable and helpful (especially when it comes to explaining the confusing jargon of insurance coverage), and I really appreciate how proactive and engaging she is. It makes a huge difference compared to any other dental office (or other medical office for that matter) that I’ve been to. I have only amazing things to say and I will always come here! I really believe their mission of leading their practice with kindness and a good heart, because all of the staff are kind and genuine.

originalText.text:
This was the best dentist visit I’ve ever had in my life. Dr. Del Carpio is so patient and explains things in a wonderful way. The office staff are all so friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. The office itself is SO NICE - brand new, felt like I was in a spa. Finally, little thoughtful touches made the experience so much better (sunglasses, lip balm, etc).

This was a genuinely unique dentist office and the best I’ve ever been to

originalText.text: Had a wonderful experience with Dr. Isabel del Carpio and her team. The staff at Mint + Bella are not only highly professional but also genuinely caring. They take time to listen to concerns, thoroughly explain treatment options and ensure that patients are fully informed and comfortable with decisions. I appreciate their transparency and the fact that I never felt pressured into unnecessary procedures or services. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Isabel del Carpio to anyone seeking a dentist who truly cares about their patients’ wellbeing.

originalText.text: This is the go place if you are looking for a great dentist (Dr Isabel) and a fantastic staff. The location is stunning and beautifully designed. Everything is explained to you during and after the visit. I highly recommend this place. Easy to book and Rose is always available to go over your insurance benefits, schedule or re-schedule you based on your needs. You will have a 5 stars treatment no doubt.
